name: Assassin
effect: Assassins leap to the farthest enemy at the start of combat and deal additional Critical Strike Damage.

name: Blademaster
effect: Blademasters have a 35% chance to strike additional times each attack.

name: Elementalist
effect: Elementalists gain double mana from attacks

bonus.value: At the start of combat, summon an Elemental. Elemental has 2200 health, 40 armor & 100 Attack Damage

name: Guardian
effect: At the start of combat, Guardians grant adjacent allies bonus armor. This effect stacks but Guardians do not benefit from the bonus.

bonus.value: At the start of combat, all adjacent allies receive +45 armor. Stacks any number of times.

name: Gunslinger
effect: After attacking, Gunslingers have a 50% chance to fire additional attacks.

bonus.value: Attack 2 additional random enemies in range.
Attack 4 additional random enemies in range.

name: Knight
effect: Knights block damage from all sources.

name: Ranger
effect: Rangers have a chance to double their attack speed for the next 3s.

name: Shapeshifter
effect: Shapeshifters gain bonus maximum Health when they transform.

name: Sorcerer
effect: Sorcerers gain double mana from attacking and allies have increased spell damage.
